name: Dumpster Friday!
description:
It's Friday Night! Dumpster night!

Out behind the World of Food Convenience store Zazoo the Raccoon is about to feast on the discarded food in the dumpster, and about to tell you the story the legendary heist of how he acquired it all.

The only problem is that Zazoo's a bit of an unreliable narrator: he's trying to tell you what happened,  but can't remember everything that transpired in order (and probably isn't getting his facts straight anyway). As he jumps from point to point in the story, the full picture of his mischief comes clear. Did he collect enough to feed himself and his friends?

In the spirit of the Minijam (112: Chrono), you've got three buttons: left, right, and space.
